comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.body:

issue.title: check-host.net some necessary information is hidden

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites - [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [x] Browser version is up-to-date; - [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? AdGuard Browser Extension ### AdGuard version 2.4.5.45 ### What type of problem have you encountered? Website or app doesn't work properly ### Which browser(s) do you use? Firefox ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? https://check-host.net/check-dns?host=1.1.1.1 ### Ad Blocking AdGuard Base filter ### Privacy _No response_ ### Social Widgets _No response_ ### Annoyances _No response_ ### Security _No response_ ### Other _No response_ ### DNS filters _No response_ ### Language-specific _No response_ ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots 1. When a click on location like "Sweden" so "ISP" is empty, but there should be a link to a hosting provider. The same is for Czech Republic and UK. 2. Screenshots
Screenshot 1:
### Privacy - [x] I agree to follow this condition

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://yandex.ru/games/app/213902](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fyandex.ru%2Fgames%2Fapp%2F213902) ### Comment > При включенном Базовом фильтре нельзя получить бесплатные награды: ругается на установленный блокировщик рекламы. Без Базового фильтра работает корректно, но каждый раз надо перезапускать браузер и справа также полоска с рекламой, которая не попала на второй скриншот. Проблема проявилась после обновления Adguard от 9 августа 2025. ``` Username: @Alex ``` ### Screenshots

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.body:
### Prerequisites - [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [x] Browser version is up-to-date; - [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? AdGuard for Windows ### AdGuard version 7.21.2 (5086) (CL 1.18.34, DL 2.6.8 ) ### What type of problem have you encountered? Website or app doesn't work properly ### Which browser(s) do you use? Chrome ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? https://www.xinshuru.com ### Ad Blocking AdGuard Base filter ### Privacy AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyPrivacy ### Social Widgets _No response_ ### Annoyances Adblock Warning Removal List, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter ### Security _No response_ ### Other Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion, AdGuard Experimental filter ### DNS filters _No response_ ### Language-specific AdGuard Chinese filter, CJX's Annoyances List, xinggsf ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests ### Add your comment and screenshots 1. `s.ssl.qhres2.com`rules makes website work doesn't properly, but shouldn't unblock its domain cause privacy reason. 2. Screenshots
Screenshot 1:
Screenshot 2 when AdGuard Tracking Protection filter disabled :
